channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 18:36 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 18:36 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 18:10 Done alarms to Donetsk Region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 18:10 Done alarms to Donetsk Region. Watch for further messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 18:02 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- March Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 18:02 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- March Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
